definitions.title: n.pr.loc. 1.
definitions.body: former name of Bethel Ge 28:19 (J), Ge 35:6 (E), Ge 48:3 (P), Jos 18:13, Jos 18:13 (P), Ju Jdg 1:23 ; appar. distinct fr. B. [[מִבֵּית־אֵל לוּ֫זָה]] Jos 16:2 (JE; but ´[[ל]] here perh. explan. gloss, v.Di); LXX Louza, Ge 28:19 [oulam]mauv
city in hands of Hittites Ju Jdg 1:26 (on conject. as to site v. GFM); LXX Louza.
